action: The main control is stationary, moving on its own, not finding its way, starting to find its way
The main control remains stationary, moves on its own, completes pathfinding, and stops moving
Standing still in front of the controller, or sticking to it, not handling it
The main control is moving, moving itself, searching for the way, interrupting the search
Walking in front of or close to the controller; Searching without processing, stop moving without searching
Master control moves, remains stationary, starts moving
Main control moving, self moving, no path found, following movement

args_list: 每一帧，向操作方向移动移动速度的距离
